DOC.brief_title: Satiety Response White Brown Rice Compared Glucose Control
DOC.detailed_description: This study acute , randomize , repeat measure design 20 subject . Subjects consume 3 test breakfast , white rice , brown rice , glucose control , contain 400 calorie . Treatments one week apart . After consumption control breakfast , subject complete visual analogue scale ( VAS ) satiety response . Additionally , consume pizza lunch record food intake next 24 hour . Breath gas sample collect estimate fermentation fiber large intestine . Also , subjective data gastrointestinal tolerance collect .
